title: How to set Club tags
body: I know that someone already asked how to set a club tag but i couldn't figure out what they were talking about so i decided to ask again. How do you set a club tag

replies.body:
For the time being, we have actually [disabled the creation of club tags](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/ih5gWw8j-56-club-tag-creation-disabled-and-server-error-message-in-client).  

Hopefully we should get it back up and running normally soon!
Thank you for your work RIOT
